page.title: 15THE A52 ROAD NEAR NEWTON.
page.content: This road has not been up-dated to deal with the heavy container lorries which pass along it between the East Coast ports and the Midlands.It twists and undulates and is very narrow so that overtaking is both difficult and dangerous.Nor is the road surface strong enough to stand the weight and frequent repairs have been necessary during the past 5 years.There is no lay-by,no cafe and no garage on this section so the only impact that the traffic has on the area is that of inconvenience to local road-users.Even the villages are far enough away not to suffer from noise pollution!During wet or snowy weather minor flooding occurs on this section.In the summer the traffic is increased by holiday- makers.
